frontmatter.title: How do we spend your money
frontmatter.lead: As we move on to our 2020 edition, we feel important to let our attendees know, how we spend all the money we receive from tickets and sponsors.

frontmatter.title: How can we evaluate over 600 talk proposals
frontmatter.lead: Reasons on how and why we evaluate CFPs in the way we do, and the about tools that we use to help us.
